verses.verse: We <WG2249> then <WG1161> that are strong <WG1415> ought <WG3784> <WG5719> to bear <WG941> <WG5721> the infirmities <WG771> of the weak <WG102>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> to please <WG700> <WG5721> ourselves <WG1438>.
<WG1063> Let <WG700> every one <WG1538> of us <WG2257> please <WG700> <WG5720> his neighbour <WG4139> for <WG1519> his good <WG18> to <WG4314> edification <WG3619>.

That <WG2443> ye may <WG1392> with one mind <WG3661> and <WG1722> one <WG1520> mouth <WG4750> glorify <WG1392> <WG5725> 'Elohim <WG2316>, even <WG2532> the Father <WG3962> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

Wherefore <WG1352> receive ye <WG4355> <WG5732> one another <WG240>, as <WG2531> <WG2532> Moshiach <WG5547> also <WG2531> received <WG4355> <WG5639> us <WG2248> to <WG1519> the glory <WG1391> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Now <WG1161> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> that Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> was <WG1096> <WG5771> a minister <WG1249> of the b'ritmilah <WG4061> for <WG5228> the truth <WG225> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, to <WG1519> confirm <WG950> <WG5658> the promises <WG1860> made unto the fathers <WG3962>:

And <WG1161> that the goyim <WG1484> might glorify <WG1392> <WG5658> 'Elohim <WG2316> for <WG5228> his mercy <WG1656>; as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, For <WG1223> this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> I will confess <WG1843> <WG5698> to thee <WG4671> among <WG1722> the goyim <WG1484>, and <WG2532> sing <WG5567> <WG5692> unto thy <WG4675> name <WG3686>.
And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, Rejoice, ye <WG2165> <WG5682> goyim <WG1484>, with <WG3326> his <WG846> people <WG2992>.
And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, Praise <WG134> the YY <WG2962>, all <WG3956> ye <WG134> <WG5720> goyim <WG1484>; and <WG2532> laud <WG1867> <WG5657> him <WG846>, all ye <WG3956> people <WG2992>.

And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, Esaias <WG2268> saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, There shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> a root <WG4491> of Yishai <WG2421>, and <WG2532> he that shall rise <WG450> <WG5734> to reign over <WG757> <WG5721> the goyim <WG1484>; in <WG1909> him <WG846> shall <WG1679> the goyim <WG1484> trust <WG1679> <WG5692>.

Now <WG1161> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of hope <WG1680> fill <WG4137> <WG5659> you <WG5209> with all <WG3956> joy <WG5479> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> in <WG1722> believing <WG4100> <WG5721>, that <WG1519> ye <WG5209> may abound <WG4052> <WG5721> in <WG1722> hope <WG1680>, through <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>.

And <WG1161> I <WG1473> myself <WG846> also <WG2532> am persuaded <WG3982> <WG5769> of <WG4012> you <WG5216>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, that <WG3754> ye <WG846> also <WG2532> are <WG2075> <WG5748> full <WG3324> of goodness <WG19>, filled <WG4137> <WG5772> with all <WG3956> knowledge <WG1108>, able <WG1410> <WG5740> also <WG2532> to admonish <WG3560> <WG5721> one another <WG240>.

Nevertheless <WG1161>, brethren <WG80>, I have written <WG1125> <WG5656> the more boldly <WG5112> unto you <WG5213> in <WG575> some sort <WG3313>, as <WG5613> putting <WG1878> you <WG5209> in mind <WG1878> <WG5723>, because <WG1223> of the grace <WG5485> that is given <WG1325> <WG5685> to me <WG3427> of <WG5259> 'Elohim <WG2316>,

That I <WG3165> should be <WG1519> <WG1511> <WG5750> the minister <WG3011> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> to <WG1519> the goyim <WG1484>, ministering <WG2418> <WG5723> the gospel <WG2098> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, that <WG2443> the offering up <WG4376> of the goyim <WG1484> might be <WG1096> <WG5638> acceptable <WG2144>, being sanctified <WG37> <WG5772> by <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>.
I have <WG2192> <WG5719> therefore whereof <WG3767> I may glory <WG2746> through <WG1722> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> in those things which pertain to <WG4314> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> I will <WG5111> not <WG3756> dare <WG5111> <WG5692> to speak <WG2980> <WG5721> of any <WG5100> of those things which <WG3739> Moshiach <WG5547> hath <WG2716> not <WG3756> wrought <WG2716> <WG5662> by <WG1223> me <WG1700>, to make <WG1519> the goyim <WG1484> `Ovedient <WG5218>, by word <WG3056> and <WG2532> deed <WG2041>,

Through <WG1722> mighty <WG1411> signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders <WG5059>, by <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of the Spirit <WG4151> of 'Elohim <WG2316>; so <WG5620> that from <WG575> Yerushalayim <WG2419>, and <WG2532> round about <WG2945> unto <WG3360> Illyricum <WG2437>, I <WG3165> have fully preached <WG4137> <WG5760> the gospel <WG2098> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

Yea <WG1161>, so <WG3779> have I strived <WG5389> <WG5740> to preach the gospel <WG2097> <WG5733>, not <WG3756> where <WG3699> Moshiach <WG5547> was named <WG3687> <WG5681>, lest <WG3363> I should build <WG3618> <WG5725> upon <WG1909> another man's <WG245> foundation <WG2310>:

But <WG235> as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, To whom <WG3739> he <WG846> was <WG312> not <WG3756> spoken <WG312> <WG5648> of <WG4012>, they shall see <WG3700> <WG5695>: and <WG2532> they <WG3739> that have <WG191> not <WG3756> heard <WG191> <WG5754> shall understand <WG4920> <WG5704>.
For which cause <WG1352> also <WG2532> I have been <WG1465> much <WG4183> hindered <WG1465> <WG5712> from coming <WG2064> <WG5629> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>.

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> having <WG2192> <WG5723> no more <WG3371> place <WG5117> in <WG1722> these <WG575> <WG5125> parts <WG2824>, and <WG1161> having <WG2192> <WG5723> a great desire <WG1974> these many <WG4183> years <WG2094> to come <WG2064> <WG5629> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>;

Whensoever <WG5613> <WG1437> I take my journey <WG4198> <WG5741> into <WG1519> Spain <WG4681>, I will come <WG2064> <WG5695> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>: for <WG1063> I trust <WG1679> <WG5719> to see <WG2300> <WG5664> you <WG5209> in my journey <WG1279> <WG5740>, and <WG2532> to be brought on my way <WG4311> <WG5683> thitherward <WG1563> by <WG5259> you <WG5216>, if <WG1437> first <WG4412> I be <WG1705> somewhat <WG3313> filled <WG1705> <WG5686> with <WG575> your <WG5216> company.
But <WG1161> now <WG3570> I go <WG4198> <WG5736> unto <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2419> to minister <WG1247> <WG5723> unto the saints <WG40>.

For <WG1063> it hath pleased them <WG2106> <WG5656> of Macedonia <WG3109> and <WG2532> Achaia <WG882> to make <WG4160> <WG5670> a certain <WG5100> contribution <WG2842> for <WG1519> the poor <WG4434> saints <WG40> which <WG3588> are at <WG1722> Yerushalayim <WG2419>.

It hath pleased them <WG2106> <WG5656> verily <WG1063>; and <WG2532> their <WG846> debtors <WG3781> they are <WG1526> <WG5748>. For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the goyim <WG1484> have been made partakers <WG2841> <WG5656> of their <WG846> spiritual things <WG4152>, their duty is <WG3784> <WG5719> also <WG2532> to minister <WG3008> <WG5658> unto them <WG846> in <WG1722> carnal things <WG4559>.

When therefore <WG3767> I have performed <WG2005> <WG5660> this <WG5124>, and <WG2532> have sealed <WG4972> <WG5671> to them <WG846> this <WG5126> fruit <WG2590>, I will come <WG565> <WG5695> by <WG1223> you <WG5216> into <WG1519> Spain <WG4681>.

And <WG1161> I am sure <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754>, when I come <WG2064> <WG5740> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>, I shall come <WG2064> <WG5695> in <WG1722> the fulness <WG4138> of the b'rakhah <WG2129> of the gospel <WG2098> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

That <WG2443> I may be delivered <WG4506> <WG5686> from <WG575> them that do not believe <WG544> <WG5723> in <WG1722> Judaea <WG2449>; and <WG2532> that <WG2443> my <WG3450> service <WG1248> which <WG3588> I have for <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2419> may be <WG1096> <WG5638> accepted <WG2144> of the saints <WG40>;
